apis.description: List the admins in the account

operations.notes: List the admins in the account

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: Scope the results to those with user IDs equal to any of the IDs specified here.

id.description: The unique identifier for the account role/user assignment.

role.description: The account role assigned. This can be 'AccountAdmin' or a user-defined role created by the Roles API.

user.description: The user the role is assigned to. See the Users API for details.

status.description: The status of the account role/user assignment.
